## interactions.functions.WillCallThrowingFunction class

Defines an interaction that executes a registered function with specific arguments, expecting that function to throw an error

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class WillCallThrowingFunction extends AnyInteractionDescriptor
```

**Extends:** [AnyInteractionDescriptor](./case-definition-dsl.interactions.base.anyinteractiondescriptor.md)
